item.title: The IPO Fund - Outperform The Index
item.description: We have decided to start a new fund that focuses on IPO stocks. We will call the fund “The IPO Fund”. We decided to build this fund after studying 10 years of IPO data and came to the following conclusions: If we had invested in every stock that we knew about that went public since 2010, we would have outperformed the index (S&P500) by more than 130%. If we were more selective and invested in stocks that not only we knew about but we also felt confident about, we would have outperformed the index by more than 360%.

item.title: Welcome to Fundalytica
item.description: Fundalytica was created with two goals in mind: Find high performing assets and strategies through research. Build investing tools that greatly improve investing decisions. Stay tuned for exciting updates. Written by Fotios Dotcom for Fundalytica You can find this article on: Fundalytica Blog - Substack - Medium
